Episodes.Title: The Return - Joining Forces
Episodes.Plot: Professor X summons the team to reassemble to rescue a fellow mutant in Japan in the opener of the anime series following the adventures of a group of superheroes.

Episodes.Title: U-Men - Mutant Hunting
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men learn of a second mutant kidnapping, and they step into the trap of an anti-mutant group.

Episodes.Title: Armor - Awakening
Episodes.Plot: Professor X runs tests on Emma Frost out of concern for her safety after learning that the mutants that were captured by the U-Men are forming secondary powers.

Episodes.Title: Transformation - Secondary Mutation
Episodes.Plot: Emma Frost joins the X-Men; Hisako begins training; Professor X probes Emma Frost's mind to explore her past.

Episodes.Title: Power - Unity
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men return to Japan to probe the site where mysterious secondary mutations have occurred.

Episodes.Title: Conflict - Contested
Episodes.Plot: An unknown foe rises as Wolverine, Storm and Beast investigate the Blackbird.

Episodes.Title: Betrayal - Shock
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men battle a giant monster that turns out to be a transformed research assistant.

Episodes.Title: Lost - Omen
Episodes.Plot: Yui's experimental drug fails to stop the mutant gene from awakening.

Episodes.Title: Revelations - Mastermind
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men best Hedgehog and follow Marsh and Mastermind deeper into Yui's laboratory.

Episodes.Title: Countdown - Truth
Episodes.Plot: Marsh traps Emma Frost, Hisako and Yui; Neuron subdues Wolverine and Beast; Hisako reflects on a mutant who went into hiding.

Episodes.Title: Revenge - The End
Episodes.Plot: Professor X summons the X-Men to protect humanity as the world is on the brink of destruction.

Episodes.Title: Destiny - Bonds
Episodes.Plot: On the brink of world destruction, Charles reaches out to all the X-Men, other mutants and heroes around the world asking them to support one another and protect humanity.
